name: 賀一平
objective:
本課程涵蓋的主題包含句法，語意，語音，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics:  syntax, semantics, morphology, phonetics & phonology, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning, language teaching or other language-related study.
schedule:
Week             Topic
1                Orientation
2                First language acquisition
3                Second language acquisition
4                Second language acquisition
5                Pragmatics
6                Discourse analysis
7                Words and word-formation processes
8                Morphology
9                Mid-term Exam
10               Phrases and sentences: grammar
11               Syntax
12               Semantics
13               Phonetics and phonology
14               Sociolinguistics: Language and regional variation
15               Sociolinguistics: Language and social variation
16               Sociolinguistics: Language and culture
17               Language history and change
18               Final Exam
scorePolicy:
